about_the_game:
This DLC contains four Weapons:

- Rougarou (Mosin Obrez)
- Once Bitten (Lebel 1886 Marksman)
- Blood Moon (Auto-5)
- Midnight Howl (Uppercut)


Rougarou 

A werewolf of Cajun legend, the Rougarou is damned to spend 101 days with the body of a man, the head of a wolf, and the bloodlust of both. This Mosin Nagant provides tribute to – and protection against – the monster's cannibalistic fury.


Once Bitten

A brutal attack left this Lebel Marksman's bearer scarred and wary, body and gun raked and ravaged by enormous, bloody claws. From that day on that Hunter favored stealth and the sniper’s perch – never letting another foe get close enough to see the damage – or inflict any more.


Blood Moon

Blood spilled beneath a blood moon takes on the transformative power of the lunar eclipse, bolstering intent both malicious and noble. Anointed with such blood, this Auto-5 has served Hunters well: a cruel mirror of the ritualistic power of the heavens.


Midnight Howl

The sound of a shot from this Caldwell Uppercut tears through the night like the howl of a hungry wolf. Under a full moon, its power waxes, defiant and deadly, forcing howls of pain from the enemies you will cut down with its unsanctified fire.


The wolf is one of nature’s most accomplished hunters, and those seeking to channel the animal’s efficient brutality will want this set of new Legendary weapons in their arsenal, weapons that bear witness to their skill in hunting and tracking, to local werewolf legends, and to the influence of the heavens. Controlled by bloodlust, hunger, and the undeniable pull of the moon – we fear wolves; we are wolves. And from wolves, we Hunters have much to learn.
